meanings.definition: To be unsuccessful in achieving a goal or purpose.
meanings.sent1: She failed to finish her homework on time.
meanings.sent2: The team failed to win the championship.
meanings.sent3: The cake failed to rise in the oven, making it flat.
meanings.sent4: His attempt to climb the mountain failed miserably.
meanings.sent5: The engine failed just before the race, causing disappointment.

meanings.sent1: The failed project left everyone disappointed.
meanings.sent2: Her failed attempt at baking a cake was evident.
meanings.sent3: The failed magic trick made the audience chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The failed interview left him feeling discouraged.
meanings.sent5: The failed plan resulted in chaos and confusion.

meanings.sent1: The old car failed to start in the cold weather.
meanings.sent2: The light bulb failed and needed to be replaced.
meanings.sent3: The clock failed to chime at the right time, causing confusion.
meanings.sent4: The computer failed to boot up, frustrating the user.
meanings.sent5: The phone failed to charge overnight, leading to a dead battery.
